<button type="button" id="abrirEmail" onclick="myFunction()">ABRIR EMAIL</button>
<script type="text/javascript">
    var url, value, action, formAction, htmlContent, destinatario, assunto;
    
    $(window).load(function(){
         setTimeout(function() {
        
        }, 10000);
    
    }); 

    
    $(document).ready(function(){
        $("#submit").remove();
        value = "#requestParam.id_atividade#"; //get activity id do processo "pai"
        action= "#requestParam._action#";
        url = "#request.scheme#://#request.serverName#:#request.serverPort##request.contextPath#/web/userview/workflowPL/UV_PL_Geral/_/filaTrabalho?_mode=assignment&activityId=" + value; //criar url inserindo activity id atual do processo";
        
        htmlContent = $("div[name=mensagem] textarea[id*=mensagem]").text();
        if(action==="submit"){
            url = localStorage.getItem("redirectUrl");
            //console.log(url);
           redirect();
        }
        if(value===""){
           $("#btn").remove();
        }else{
            localStorage.setItem("redirectUrl",url); 
        }
         $("button#abrirEmail").show();

        
        

    });
    
    
    $(document).change(function(){
        if($("ul[class*=fileupload]").children().length > 0){
            $("button#abrirEmail").hide();
        }else{
            $("button#abrirEmail").show();
        }
        
        $('a.remove').click( function(e){
            if($("ul[class*=fileupload]").children().length == 1){ //Igual a 1 pois o nÃºmero sÃ³ atualiza apÃ³s o evento
                $("button#abrirEmail").show();
            }
        });
        
        
    });
    
    
    
    
    
function myFunction(){
    
    if($('select[id^=template]').val() !== ''){
            htmlContent = $("div[name=mensagem] iframe").contents().find('html:first').find('body:first').html();
        }else{
            htmlContent = $("div[name=mensagem] textarea[id*=mensagem]").text();
        }
        destinatario = $("input#destinatarios").val();
        assunto = $("input#assunto").val();

    var mailHtm = htmlContent;
    var emailto = destinatario;
    var emailsubject = "Email-" + assunto;
    var emlCont = 'To: '+emailto + '\n';

    emlCont += 'Subject: '+emailsubject+'\n';
    emlCont += 'X-Unsent: 1'+'\n';

    emlCont += 'Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8'+'\n';
    emlCont += ''+'\n';

    emlCont += "<!DOCTYPE html><html><head></head><body>" + mailHtm + "</body></html>";
    //console.log(emlCont) ;
    var textFile = null;
    var data = new Blob([emlCont], {type: "text/html; charset=utf-8" });
    if (textFile !== null) {
            window.URL.revokeObjectURL(textFile);
    }

    textFile = window.URL.createObjectURL(data);
    console.log(textFile);

    var a = document.createElement('a'); //make a link in document
    var linkText = document.createTextNode('fileLink');
    a.appendChild(linkText) ;

    a.href = textFile;

    a.id = 'fileLink';
    a.download = emailsubject+".eml"; //'filenameTest.eml' ;
    a.style.visibility = "hidden";

    document.body.appendChild(a) ;

    document.getElementById('fileLink').click();
    document.getElementById('fileLink').remove();
    
    
}


    
function redirect(){
    return window.location.href=url;
}
    
//SubstituiÃ§Ã£o de valores no texto do template
$("div[name=mensagem]").on('DOMSubtreeModified',function(){
    var emailHtml = $("iframe[id*=mensagem]").contents().find('body').html();
    if(emailHtml){
        var idProcesso= "#requestParam.fk_id_processo#";
        var idDetalheProcesso = "#form.processos.detalhe_processo[{requestParam.fk_id_processo}]#";
        var n_wf_banco = "#form.detalhe_processo.n_wf_banco[{form.processos.detalhe_processo[{requestParam.fk_id_processo}]}]#";
        emailHtml = emailHtml.replace("n_wf_banco", n_wf_banco);
        var iframehtml =   $("iframe[id*=mensagem]").contents().find('body').html();
        if(iframehtml!==emailHtml)
            $("iframe[id*=mensagem]").contents().find('body').html(emailHtml);
    }
});

</script>
